26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_core_mm.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:30 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include <core/mm.h>
30
31#define node(root, dir) ((root)->nl_entry.dir == &mm->nodes) ? NULL : \
32 list_entry((root)->nl_entry.dir, struct nvkm_mm_node, nl_entry)
33
34void
35nvkm_mm_dump(struct nvkm_mm *mm, const char *header)
36{
37 struct nvkm_mm_node *node;
38
39 printk(KERN_ERR "nvkm: %s\n", header);
40 printk(KERN_ERR "nvkm: node list:\n");
41 list_for_each_entry(node, &mm->nodes, nl_entry) {
42 printk(KERN_ERR "nvkm: \t%08x %08x %d\n",
43 node->offset, node->length, node->type);
44 }
45 printk(KERN_ERR "nvkm: free list:\n");
46 list_for_each_entry(node, &mm->free, fl_entry) {
47 printk(KERN_ERR "nvkm: \t%08x %08x %d\n",
48 node->offset, node->length, node->type);
49 }
50}
51
52void
53nvkm_mm_free(struct nvkm_mm *mm, struct nvkm_mm_node **pthis)
54{
55 struct nvkm_mm_node *this = *pthis;
56
57 if (this) {
58 struct nvkm_mm_node *prev = node(this, prev);
59 struct nvkm_mm_node *next = node(this, next);
60
61 if (prev && prev->type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE) {
62 prev->length += this->length;
63 list_del(&this->nl_entry);
64 kfree(this); this = prev;
65 }
66
67 if (next && next->type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE) {
68 next->offset = this->offset;
69 next->length += this->length;
70 if (this->type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE)
71 list_del(&this->fl_entry);
72 list_del(&this->nl_entry);
73 kfree(this); this = NULL;
74 }
75
76 if (this && this->type != NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE) {
77 list_for_each_entry(prev, &mm->free, fl_entry) {
78 if (this->offset < prev->offset)
79 break;
80 }
81
82 list_add_tail(&this->fl_entry, &prev->fl_entry);
83 this->type = NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE;
84 }
85 }
86
87 *pthis = NULL;
88}
89
90static struct nvkm_mm_node *
91region_head(struct nvkm_mm *mm, struct nvkm_mm_node *a, u32 size)
92{
93 struct nvkm_mm_node *b;
94
95 if (a->length == size)
96 return a;
97
98 b = kmalloc(sizeof(*b), GFP_KERNEL);
99 if (unlikely(b == NULL))
100 return NULL;
101
102 b->offset = a->offset;
103 b->length = size;
104 b->heap = a->heap;
105 b->type = a->type;
106 a->offset += size;
107 a->length -= size;
108 list_add_tail(&b->nl_entry, &a->nl_entry);
109 if (b->type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE)
110 list_add_tail(&b->fl_entry, &a->fl_entry);
111
112 return b;
113}
114
115int
116nvkm_mm_head(struct nvkm_mm *mm, u8 heap, u8 type, u32 size_max, u32 size_min,
117 u32 align, struct nvkm_mm_node **pnode)
118{
119 struct nvkm_mm_node *prev, *this, *next;
120 u32 mask = align - 1;
121 u32 splitoff;
122 u32 s, e;
123
124 BUG_ON(type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE || type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_HOLE);
125
126 list_for_each_entry(this, &mm->free, fl_entry) {
127 if (unlikely(heap != NVKM_MM_HEAP_ANY)) {
128 if (this->heap != heap)
129 continue;
130 }
131 e = this->offset + this->length;
132 s = this->offset;
133
134 prev = node(this, prev);
135 if (prev && prev->type != type)
136 s = roundup(s, mm->block_size);
137
138 next = node(this, next);
139 if (next && next->type != type)
140 e = rounddown(e, mm->block_size);
141
142 s = (s + mask) & ~mask;
143 e &= ~mask;
144 if (s > e || e - s < size_min)
145 continue;
146
147 splitoff = s - this->offset;
148 if (splitoff && !region_head(mm, this, splitoff))
149 return -ENOMEM;
150
151 this = region_head(mm, this, min(size_max, e - s));
152 if (!this)
153 return -ENOMEM;
154
155 this->type = type;
156 list_del(&this->fl_entry);
157 *pnode = this;
158 return 0;
159 }
160
161 return -ENOSPC;
162}
163
164static struct nvkm_mm_node *
165region_tail(struct nvkm_mm *mm, struct nvkm_mm_node *a, u32 size)
166{
167 struct nvkm_mm_node *b;
168
169 if (a->length == size)
170 return a;
171
172 b = kmalloc(sizeof(*b), GFP_KERNEL);
173 if (unlikely(b == NULL))
174 return NULL;
175
176 a->length -= size;
177 b->offset = a->offset + a->length;
178 b->length = size;
179 b->heap = a->heap;
180 b->type = a->type;
181
182 list_add(&b->nl_entry, &a->nl_entry);
183 if (b->type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE)
184 list_add(&b->fl_entry, &a->fl_entry);
185
186 return b;
187}
188
189int
190nvkm_mm_tail(struct nvkm_mm *mm, u8 heap, u8 type, u32 size_max, u32 size_min,
191 u32 align, struct nvkm_mm_node **pnode)
192{
193 struct nvkm_mm_node *prev, *this, *next;
194 u32 mask = align - 1;
195
196 BUG_ON(type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_NONE || type == NVKM_MM_TYPE_HOLE);
197
198 list_for_each_entry_reverse(this, &mm->free, fl_entry) {
199 u32 e = this->offset + this->length;
200 u32 s = this->offset;
201 u32 c = 0, a;
202 if (unlikely(heap != NVKM_MM_HEAP_ANY)) {
203 if (this->heap != heap)
204 continue;
205 }
206
207 prev = node(this, prev);
208 if (prev && prev->type != type)
209 s = roundup(s, mm->block_size);
210
211 next = node(this, next);
212 if (next && next->type != type) {
213 e = rounddown(e, mm->block_size);
214 c = next->offset - e;
215 }
216
217 s = (s + mask) & ~mask;
218 a = e - s;
219 if (s > e || a < size_min)
220 continue;
221
222 a = min(a, size_max);
223 s = (e - a) & ~mask;
224 c += (e - s) - a;
225
226 if (c && !region_tail(mm, this, c))
227 return -ENOMEM;
228
229 this = region_tail(mm, this, a);
230 if (!this)
231 return -ENOMEM;
232
233 this->type = type;
234 list_del(&this->fl_entry);
235 *pnode = this;
236 return 0;
237 }
238
239 return -ENOSPC;
240}
241
242int
243nvkm_mm_init(struct nvkm_mm *mm, u32 offset, u32 length, u32 block)
244{
245 struct nvkm_mm_node *node, *prev;
246 u32 next;
247
248 if (nvkm_mm_initialised(mm)) {
249 prev = list_last_entry(&mm->nodes, typeof(*node), nl_entry);
250 next = prev->offset + prev->length;
251 if (next != offset) {
252 BUG_ON(next > offset);
253 if (!(node = kzalloc(sizeof(*node), GFP_KERNEL)))
254 return -ENOMEM;
255 node->type = NVKM_MM_TYPE_HOLE;
256 node->offset = next;
257 node->length = offset - next;
258 list_add_tail(&node->nl_entry, &mm->nodes);
259 }
260 BUG_ON(block != mm->block_size);
261 } else {
262 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mm->nodes);
263 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mm->free);
264 mm->block_size = block;
265 mm->heap_nodes = 0;
266 }
267
268 node = kzalloc(sizeof(*node), GFP_KERNEL);
269 if (!node)
270 return -ENOMEM;
271
272 if (length) {
273 node->offset = roundup(offset, mm->block_size);
274 node->length = rounddown(offset + length, mm->block_size);
275 node->length -= node->offset;
276 }
277
278 list_add_tail(&node->nl_entry, &mm->nodes);
279 list_add_tail(&node->fl_entry, &mm->free);
280 node->heap = ++mm->heap_nodes;
281 return 0;
282}
283
284int
285nvkm_mm_fini(struct nvkm_mm *mm)
286{
287 struct nvkm_mm_node *node, *temp;
288 int nodes = 0;
289
290 if (!nvkm_mm_initialised(mm))
291 return 0;
292
293 list_for_each_entry(node, &mm->nodes, nl_entry) {
294 if (node->type != NVKM_MM_TYPE_HOLE) {
295 if (++nodes > mm->heap_nodes) {
296 nvkm_mm_dump(mm, "mm not clean!");
297 return -EBUSY;
298 }
299 }
300 }
301
302 list_for_each_entry_safe(node, temp, &mm->nodes, nl_entry) {
303 list_del(&node->nl_entry);
304 kfree(node);
305 }
306
307 mm->heap_nodes = 0;
308 return 0;
309}
